section.section:
A constitutional officer who is a member of the Employees' Pension System:
on taking office, has immediate vesting rights in the Employees' Pension System; and
except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, is entitled to a retirement allowance as provided in Title 23, Subtitle 4 of this article.
The retirement allowance of a constitutional officer who serves at least one full term may not be less than 10% of the annual salary received during the constitutional officer's last term.
